selectPlayersGamblersDream(Pair<Integer, Integer>[]) - Method in class clientSide.entities.Coach
Selects players using the Gambler's Dream method, where the weakest players are selected initially, then the strongest players are selected in subsequent games after a certain number of games.
selectPlayersSweaty(Pair<Integer, Integer>[]) - Method in class clientSide.entities.Coach
Selects players using the Sweaty method, where the strongest players are selected.
